channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped rubbish on the pavement, 21st February
item.description:
Neighbours from 74 BR5 2AN dumped their rubbish on the pavement outside. It is a white rubbish bag with rubbish in it. It has been there for a week now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakdene Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime Bikes Parked Dangerously, 21st February
item.description:
Lime E-bikes Parked Dangerously some are On pavement and Blocking road some are fallen over to the ground. A couple of bikes are blocking business entrances as well on Little Newport Street. Might hurt somebody.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Little Newport Street, Chinatown, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unsafe and contractors & waste management, 21st February
item.description:
